subject: Your loan application is waiting
body:
Dear Homeowner

Would you like to reduce your mortgage payment?. Your loan approval is waiting.

You can receive $250,000 for 
$670 per month.

Please respond A S A P.

Jean Martiniere

Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.	Samuel Butler (1612-1680)
